arcs.headline: Seamless AI Agents with OpenClaw
arcs.summary: We've launched a dedicated integration for OpenClaw, enabling users to configure models like Kimi, GPT, and Gemini with a single command. The update includes a streamlined 2-step auto-installation script and a visual polish with improved mobile responsiveness.

one_liner: AI agents just got easier with a seamless, one-command OpenClaw integration and a fresh UI polish.
pr_summary:
TODAY'S UPDATES (3 merged PRs):

- #8168: fix: OpenClaw branding — favicon, logos, fonts
